Posts.Content: Apr 12, 2008 09:12PM bjn850 wrote: Yes, I had an outbreak similar to what you describe. It began at the entry spot of my mammosite tubing(after rad tx was over and tubing was removed) and extended in an oval shape for a couple of inches It began as just red, irritated skin but eventually had layers of blisters, and itched/burned. This was during my4th chemo tx. My medical oncologist suggested it was Herpes or shingles and said she could order antibiotics if it continued.  It didn't. I hope yours gets cleared up quickly.  We certainly don't need extra stuff like this!
Posts.Title: Herpes Simplex? HeatherBLocklear lilith
